data.name: Confess My Love
data.detailed_description:
——————————————————————————

The story took place in a day after school.Willie decided to confess his love to Liza,his favorite girl, but he hesitated to do so cause he was afraid of being refused.
Should he summon up all his courage to confess his love to her?

Why Julie is still here？

It's important to put away his diary, there's something terrible written in this diary and can't be seen by anyone.

And finally, Willie found out there was something weird in this classroom,the room he should feel familiar with.
——————————————————————————

【Charcter introduction】

Willie: The major charcter, can't make up his mind to confess his love to Liza.

Liza:The girl Willie liked, always does her homework at school before her part-time job at night.

Julie:Insist to stay in the classroom for unknown reason.

——————————————————————————

This is a mini game with 20 endings.
Each of them is short and no longer than five minutes.
The story will has subtle changes once you obtained a new ending each time.



This game is quite boring, the main content is to explore and dialogue. Maybe it will take three hours. If you can not find what to do next, please refer to the tips page.

——————————————————————————

The story took place in a day after school.Willie decided to confess his love to Liza, his favorite girl, but he hesitated to do so cause he was afraid of being refused.
Should he summon up all his courage to confess his love to her?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/ Vista/7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 1.06Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
